content: sakura sprite or monkey by kakapocrochet materials - yarn for the body - scrap amount for the flower - small amount of felt and glue - stuffing tools - darning needle - sewing pins - stitch markers - hook 1 size down terminology us no special terms are used please credit me for the pattern and don t copy it body r1 magic_ring 6sc r2 6inc r3 6 single_crochet increase r4 6 2sc increase r5 6 3sc increase r6 2 6sc increase 6sc decrease r7 6sc increase 14sc increase 8sc r8-17 single_crochet around 10 rounds start stuffing r18 8 2sc decrease r19 8 single_crochet decrease r20 8dec fo and sew hole closed face sakura tip after slsting back into the magic_ring and the ch1 push your petal towards the other petals r1 magic_ring 5 ch1 half_double_crochet ch2 half_double_crochet ch2 slip_stitch ch1 slip_stitch back into the magic_ring arms make 2 - don t stuff r1 magic_ring 6sc r2 blo 2 2sc increase r3-6 single_crochet around 4 rounds r7 flatten the 2 sides together and single_crochet across legs make 2 - don t stuff r1 mr6 r2 3 increase single_crochet r3 blosc around r4 single_crochet around for a monkey sprite make ears make 2 tip if you want the centre of the ear to be a different colour make r1 in that colour then switch back to brown on your last single_crochet and do r2 in brown r1 magic_ring 5sc r2 single_crochet increase single_crochet increase single_crochet fo and tie your two tails together tail tip if you want a bendy tail crochet around a wire or pipe cleaner and if you want a skinnier tail change r1 to magic_ring 6sc r1 magic_ring 8sc r2-18 single_crochet around sew the tail so the open end is flat by kakapo crochet 1 assembly you can add safety eyes to the bottom of the flower but i used felt and just glued it on towards the bottom two petals the face should go on between r4 and r11 there are 5 petals one should be in the middle of the forehead 2 petals will then be on the side and 2 on the bottom like a star the arms go on between r11 and r12 about 5 stitches apart right below the face sew the legs on the bottom of your sprite closer to the front remember you dont need to stuff the legs for the monkey the tail goes between r15 and r16 on the backside the ears go in a diagonal line between r2 and r6 they should be about 4 stitches horizontally from the face some more ideas the middle one is blank in case you want to make your own by kakapo crochet 2 by kakapo crochet 3
